uniol.apt.ui.impl

Class ParametersTransformerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.ui.impl.ParametersTransformerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParametersTransformer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AptParametersTransformer

    public abstract class ParametersTransformerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ParametersTransformer
    This class manages a bunch of parameter transformations and uses them to transform a given parameter string to an object of a specific type.
    Author:
    Renke Grunwald
